definition: order of feudal nobility, namely: Duke 公[gong1], Marquis 侯[hou2], Count 伯[bo2], Viscount 子[zi3], Baron 男[nan2]
ancient bronze wine holder with 3 legs and loop handle/nobility
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential
five orders of feudal nobility, namely: Duke 公[gong1], Marquis 侯[hou2], Count 伯[bo2], Viscount 子[zi3], Baron 男[nan2]

sentences.english: Upon their marriage, the title Duke of Edinburgh was created for him.
sentences.chinese: 婚後，他被授予愛丁堡公爵的爵位。

sentences.english: Ennoble a prime minister for distinguished service.
sentences.chinese: 因其傑出的功勞授予總理爵位。

sentences.english: And the king said, What honour and dignity hath been done to Mordecai for this?
sentences.chinese: 王說，末底改行了這事，賜他什麼尊榮爵位沒有。

sentences.english: The Republic makes a good sauce for the barony .
sentences.chinese: 以共和爲男爵爵位的調味品。

sentences.english: The king ennobled the soldier with knighthood.
sentences.chinese: 國王授予這位士兵騎士爵位。

sentences.english: They might even have a son, heir to the earldom of Stane.
sentences.chinese: 他們甚至可能生個兒子，繼承史丹的爵位。

sentences.english: The Feng dances tactfully occasion of unraveling the feudal title.
sentences.chinese: 鳳舞委婉地解釋了爵位的由來。

sentences.english: The king conferred the dignity of a peerage on the general.
sentences.chinese: 國王頒賜爵位這要職給將軍。

sentences.english: Sir arthur was the holder of a baronetcy dating back to charles i.
sentences.chinese: 阿瑟爵士擁有的準男爵爵位可追溯至查理一世時代。

sentences.english: The Queen conferred knighthoods on two bankers.
sentences.chinese: 女王授於兩位銀行家爵士爵位。

sentences.english: The eldest sons once held the privileges of patrimonial loyalty and filial inheritance in Béarn.
sentences.chinese: 長子一度能夠世襲爵位，享有優先繼承權。

sentences.english: Robert's grandfather was given the baronetcy after the war.
sentences.chinese: 羅伯特的祖父曾在戰後被授予從男爵爵位。

sentences.english: Guo gong is a title of nobility granted to founders of a state.
sentences.chinese: 國公，應是開國勳臣所封授的爵位。

sentences.english: When the duke dies, his eldest son will succeed to the title.
sentences.chinese: 公爵赴世之後，他的長子將繼承他的爵位。

sentences.english: The highest - ranking members of the Spanish aristocracy are the grandees.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙貴族中爵位最高的成員乃是大公。
